channel.title: Making new shops / Webclient
channel.description:
I cant find how to create new shops in "Uncalled attack" Source (508 server) Also i would like to know how to make webclient, so when i update the client the users update it too.
Thanks. Pekeltje

item.title: Making new shops / Webclient
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“pekeltje, post:6, topic:435150”]Thanks mr extremez!

Added in shops.cfg and actionhandler.java
Also in the spawn-config.cfg to let the NPC go in the game.

Will check the webclient soon.

Thanks.[/quote]No problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Making new shops / Webclient
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

To create a shop open up shops.cfg use this format.

To change prices open up prices.txt use this format

To make the npc open the shop use this format

Under firstclicknpc: (actionhandler.java)

case NPCID: c.getShops().openShop(SHOPID); break;

And for the web client just use this… http://www.rune-serber.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/286957-pi-webclient-tutorial-pi.html

Happy spoon feeding enjoy lol.

Read full topic
